prompts: Create a playful monkey-like Pokemon with a long tail and vibrant purple coloring.
I want a small, agile Pokemon that excels in climbing trees and swinging through branches.
Generate an adorable monkey Pokemon with big ears and a mischievous grin.
Make a cute Pokemon that has a fluffy tail and loves to collect shiny objects.
Imagine a fun-loving Pokemon that can leap high and has a purple body with white paws.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon that is known for its speed and playful personality.
Give me a Pokemon that enjoys urban environments and often plays tricks on people.
